Html:
Hi,

I am struggling to work out how to pass a WaveIn (microphone input)  directly to a WaveMixerStream32 so that it could be mixed alongside any other streams that are going to the mixer?

Thanks in advance to anyone that can help,
Oli

What I really need to do is create a DJ style application that can take a MIC input, combine with a WAV and output as a single stream which I can then use as needed (stream over a network in this case).

Is it possible to stream MIC input to WaveMixerStream32?

Oli

this is a feature I would like to add to a future version of NAudio. It is possible at the moment but you need to write a fair bit of code yourself. Also, the latency is not likely to be very good, so it may not be suitable dependent on your needs.

Mark
....an there is the possibility to have some example of code?
